sources.name: TweetSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		TweetDate as string,
		TweetTime as string,
		TweetAuthor as string,
		TweetText as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TweetSource

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
SurrogateKey1 sink(mapColumn(
		TweetDate,
		TweetTime,
		TweetAuthor,
		TweetText,
		mykey
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: SurrogateKey1
transformations.script:
TweetSource keyGenerate(output(mykey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
